adapters.name: iPlant Collaborative TNRS v3.0
adapters.description: The iPlant Collaborative TNRS provides parsing and fuzzy matching for plant taxa.

annotations.Authority: Author attributed to the accepted name (where applicable).

adapters.name: Mammal Species of the World v3.0
adapters.description: Mammal Species of the World, 3rd edition (MSW3) is a database of mammalian taxonomy. Our adaptor searches the indexed database for both exact and loose mathces
adapters.publication: Don E. Wilson & DeeAnn M. Reeder (editors). 2005. Mammal Species of the World. A Taxonomic and Geographic Reference (3rd ed)

annotations.Authority: Don E. Wilson & DeeAnn M. Reeder (editors). 2005. Mammal Species of the World. A Taxonomic and Geographic Reference (3rd ed)
